article.title: Lockheed and Raytheon to Provide Paveway II Laser Guided Bomb Components
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Missiles and Fire Control, Archbald, Pennsylvania, and Raytheon Company Missile Systems, Tucson, Arizona, were awarded separate contracts-$34 million for Lockheed, $23 Million Raytheon-to provide Paveway II laser guided bomb computer control groups (seekers) and GBU-12 air foil groups (tail kits).Â Ogden Air Logistics Center, Hill Air Force Base, Utah, is the contracting activity.
